title: Newly Renovated and Upgraded Spacious Studio in a Historic Victorian
map_address: 1913 West 3rd Street near Bonnie Brae street
posting_body: Newly Renovated and Upgraded Spacious Studio in a Historic Victorian House!
We are just minutes away from Downtown LA, Westlake, Koreatown, Dodger Stadium, and LA Live/Staples Center.
Great location with easy access to the Metro-Rail and the 110, 101, and 10 freeways.
This is a separate structure/house located behind the main property with a house bike rack and a shared laundry room.
For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact our Leasing Agent, Tom
show contact info
Please join us at our open house Thursday August 4th from 5-7.
Please Click Here/Copy this Link for a Virtual 3D Tour of This Unit!
<URL>
KEY FEATURES
Bedrooms: 0 Bed
Bathrooms: 1 Bath
Parking: $50 for 1 off street space
Unit Floor/Level: 1st-Floor Unit
Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)
Deposit: 1 month (OAC)
Pets Policy: Cats & Dogs OK
Laundry: Shared
Property Type: Apartment
UNIT DESCRIPTION
Entire Unit is Brand NEW!

Living Area with new rustic wood flooring, new paint, and new paneled doors throughout, a wall a/c-heater combination unit, a closet with sliding mirrored doors and storage cabinets above, modern ceiling fan with lights on a dimmer switch, USB port/outlet for convenient charging, and a large new double pane window with new wooden horizontal blinds.

Kitchen with new slate gray quartz countertops and breakfast bar, beautiful new modern cabinetry, brand new stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, gas stove/oven, and over-the-range microwave), deep single-bowl stainless steel sink with a black tall spout faucet, a window with wooden horizontal blinds, and a modern light fixture.

Bathroom with custom retro-tile flooring, a modern vanity with a large custom mirror and new light sconce on an automatic sensor above, a second closet for even more storage, bathtub with modern subway tiled walls and a built-in shower niche, a new window, and all new matte black accessories.
*Parking is available for $50 for 1 off street space
For additional Ben Leeds Property listings go to <URL> or call our Leasing Agent
show contact info
Pet Policy:
Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs.
(weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.
Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.
Other Terms and Requirements:

1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application;

No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2.
Renter’s insurance is required.
Equal Housing Opportunity Provider
*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*
Photos may vary from actual unit and are for representational purposes only and subject to variances.
Variances may include, but are not limited to, views and exposure to light, finishes for the final product, as well as layout and included features in the finished product.
